Paragon Multiclassing

If you have the Novice Power, Acolyte Power, and Adept Power feats for a class, you can choose to continue to gain powers from that class rather than take a paragon path. If you choose this option, you gain several benefits.

     At 11th level, you can choose to replace one of your at-will powers with an at-will power from your multiclass class.
     In place of the paragon path encounter power gained at 11th level, you can select any encounter attack power of 7th level or lower from your multiclass class.
     In place of the paragon path utility power gained at 12th level, you can select any utility power of 10th level or lower from your multiclass class.
     In place of the paragon path daily power gained at 20th level, you can select any daily attack power of 19th level or lower from your multiclass class.



Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 209.
